Detailed Description

This class represents a TinyJava IF statement.

An if statement is represented by:

  • a control Expression representation
  • a then Statement representation
  • an else Statement representation, which may be NULL

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

IfStatement::IfStatement ( int  lno,
Expression *  e,
Statement *  ts,
Statement *  es 
)

Create a new IfStatement object

Parameters:
lno a source code line number with the if statement (should be the beginning of the if statement)
e a pointer to the control Expression syntax tree
ts a pointer to the THEN Statement syntax tree
es a pointer to the ELSE Statement syntax tree, which may be NULL if the if statement has no ELSE part
Exceptions:
AstException if either the e or ts argument is NULL
